title: REK'SAI OP

replies.body:
Champ was just released: Check
Summoner is Bronze 2: Check
Calling new champ OP: Check
Is named Sniff thus cries a lot {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

Meh So i don't play a lot of ranked, this is just an opinion that i think she has too much of a kit. You can't  honestly tell me that kit is not op what so ever though especially when all my friends have bought her and have gone on a hype about how insanely over powered she is and spammed her every game. So unless you have something constructive to say leave. Most of these new champs have been fine and i have delt with it, with their tower placement passives and their insane range, but i draw the line here.

I have to say I agree with you. Highest win rate of all champs already defo suggests OP-ness.

If these guys want to keep %%%%%ing about bronze 2 players, they can see that my nobody bronze 2 self won 9 of the first 10 games I played as her (going 5 / 2 / 7 in the loss).

If a scrubby bronze 2 can do that on the first ever games with a champ, I would say something isn't quite right haha

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Inkduff,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tnZY9nJr,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-29T09:08:01.978+0000)
>
> I have to say I agree with you. Highest win rate of all champs already defo suggests OP-ness.
> 
> If these guys want to keep %%%%%ing about bronze 2 players, they can see that my nobody bronze 2 self won 9 of the first 10 games I played as her (going 5 / 2 / 7 in the loss).
> 
> If a scrubby bronze 2 can do that on the first ever games with a champ, I would say something isn't quite right haha

Swain needs a nerf then...I went 26/1 as first time Swain

But that was ages ago
you're about as funny as ebola. twerp

> [{quoted}](name=Sniff,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tnZY9nJr,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-12T15:01:29.924+0000)
> I'm pretty here to say why I think this champ is over powered so lets dive into it nice and concise. So this champ has true damage, ability to move through un--passable terrain, and instant teleport ult, ability to show  team mates where units are without wards, a single ranged based attack that has the most projectile speed I've seen in this game, hammers in melee combat both late and early, ability to gain hp off her fury, cc knock up. So basically this is an all in one champ. Nice one riot. Nice one.

- Many champions have true damage
- Every champion can move through un-passable terrain with Flash, and even more with any dash/blink ability ({{champion:38}} can do it every 3 seconds)
- Her teleport ult isn't instant, it's got some casting time, and she isn't the only one who has a global TP, plus it's conditional, she can ONLY teleport to tunnels
- Xerath's Q totally has a slower "projectile speed" off
- TARIC HAMMERS MELEE BOTH EARLY AND LATE (seriously though, {{champion:126}} hammers AND cannons through early and late but I ain't complaining)
- Tryn gains HP from Fury...and crit m8
- So many people have knock ups these days to make Yasuo's life easier...Rek's one has a tiny radius
- All in one champion? What about {{champion:64}} and {{champion:150}}? Have you forgotten them? :'(
you literally just took a bunch of different champs that have a similar abilities when this champ has all of the above.

> [{quoted}](name=Sniff,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tnZY9nJr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2014-12-16T07:09:55.794+0000)
>
> you literally just took a bunch of different champs that have a similar abilities when this champ has all of the above.

Yeah? So?

Nothing new is in Rek'Sai...

Plus, the true damage isn't that much,
The mobility is slow,
We're lucky the projectile has a projectile speed
We're lucky everyone is noted when she TPs with her screaming thing
We're lucky Fury only gives her true damage on one ability and conditional HP
The knock up radius is small

Things can be much worse man

{{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:421}}

Firstly no, the mobility is not slow. 
"yeah so" So you agree this champ is op and you're implying that we're lucky it isn't much more op than it currently sits.
So it stills remains op.

> [{quoted}](name=Sniff,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tnZY9nJr,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-16T11:10:19.795+0000)
>
> Firstly no, the mobility is not slow. 
> "yeah so" So you agree this champ is op and you're implying that we're lucky it isn't much more op than it currently sits.
> So it stills remains op.

The mobility is not slow?

Well yeah it is, you get dashes and blinks which are instant and then you get Rek'Sai's tunnel dash which is actually just slightly below average dash speed...

Dude OP, just face it, you're complaining about a new champion which you haven't worked your head around. That's ok, because every new champion is a little weird playing against when no one has experience against him/her, but honestly you're just getting laughed at because you haven't taken the time to figure out how to counter him/her and you just blurted on the forums so-and-so is OP or not.

Just work your head around Rek'Sai and stop complaining.
No, she is op, currently stands with the highest win rate in game. If this isn't enough evidence then i don't know what is. I've never complained about a new champ ever before

> [{quoted}](name=Sniff,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tnZY9nJr,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-28T14:42:50.509+0000)
>
> No, she is op, currently stands with the highest win rate in game. If this isn't enough evidence then i don't know what is. I've never complained about a new champ ever before

You judge a champion's "OP'ness" from their win rate??

o_O

A champion's "OP'ness" comes from their lack of counter play man...and Rek has places where you can counter, but new champs take time for others to get used to.

Plus her Q nerf isn't because she's OP, it's cuz she's a tad strong, not 'overpowered'.
LOL....
So if she is so easily countered, should it not follow that she is counter-picked in games, and therefore loses a lot of the time, thus not having the highest win rate in the game?

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Inkduff,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tnZY9nJr,comment-id=000300000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2014-12-29T09:09:30.860+0000)
>
> So if she is so easily countered, should it not follow that she is counter-picked in games, and therefore loses a lot of the time, thus not having the highest win rate in the game?

So counter picking a champion causes an instant loss??

No; counter picking increases the likelihood of a loss, which should be able to happen at a rate similar to other champions in the game.

We can see from the win rate that reksai wins more than any other champion in the game, though, so obviously counter picking her isn't as easy or effective as you suggested previously.

You're not paying mind to what's been said. Specifically what Strider said about the fact people take time to get used to new champs. It's been, what, 2-3 weeks since Rek'Sai was released? People are still getting used to Kalista (and arguably Azir) and you expect them to be used to Rek'Sai? Fact is people are still unaware of what best counters Rek'Sai and how to effectively play against Rek'Sai meaning, yes, she may have a higher win rate than a lot of other champs but that doesn't mean that she is OP. Win rate does not equal OPness, there are a lot more factors at play.

Good point. Sorry for not seeing that.

To further validate this point, we can look at the win rates in the higher ranks of play (presumably higher ranked players would get used to new champs faster than bronze players etc). In master+, risk is not even in the top 10 highest win rate champs!

Quite interesting, IMO
Can't say I'm too keen on a champ that's stronger than an Olaf and Kha in 1v1s early game while having the mobility of Lee and Udyr combined, oh can't forget the global presence after 6.

Idk about stronger than an Olaf, but he is pretty broken. He's got mobility, cc, stupid damage (including true (%%%%ing WHY?!)) and as you said, global presence. Sounds like Riot took a bit of everything and threw it into a ball of broken that grunts and humps the ground.
Im just saying every champ has their own unique abilites and throwing all of them into one is quite alarming to me, im interested in seeing what will happen.
Probably gonna be nerfed and turned into trash tier so kids who want free norms wins better abuse it while you can.
From what I have seen, Rek'sai is always getting Rekt.

Agreed, she may have a lot of presence on the map but you add a slow to her and she will never get you as long as you can kite and slow you will always win against her if you can do enough damage you can over power and instead of building amour build health to get around her true damage. I believe she is very balanced as with all champs if you know how to counter them there Easyer to deal with. As a jungle she has a lot of gank abillity but as a tank or top laner she won't have many tunnels on the map apart from around top lane.
i found this one quite.. easy. and also had udyr camping top.
